scan_table_check.description: A UI action usually exposes functionality to users. Even if a functionality should be exposed to all users at the time the UI Action was introduced, this may not be true in the future. Hence even for UI Actions that should be available to many or even all users, a role should be required to access the UI Action. This also applies to UI Actions that are only available on a table to which only a limited set of users have access - as also in this case, the scope of users that may have access to the table might be expanded later without necessarily intending to extend the access to the UI Action. Hence all UI Actions should at least require one role to access the UI Action.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - UI Action requires a role
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add a required role to the UI Action.
scan_table_check.short_description: UI Actions should be configured to require at least one role
scan_table_check.sys_name: CodeSanity - UI Action requires a role
